issue.title: [C++] Add support for gflags version detection
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8653](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8653). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Missing functionality from FindgflagsAlt, follop-up for https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7067/files#diff-bc36ca94c3abd969dcdbaec7125fed65R18

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8653?focusedCommentId=17096962) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
We'll be able to implement this by checking `gflags.pc`.
We can't detect version from `gflags/*.h`.
